Name: Classic White T-Shirt
Description: A soft cotton white t-shirt that goes with everything. Perfect for casual everyday wear.

Name: Slim Fit Jeans
Description: These mid-rise slim fit jeans offer a comfortable stretch and a stylish look for all occasions.

Name: Denim Jacket
Description: A timeless denim jacket with a slightly faded wash. Layer it over any outfit for an instant upgrade.

Name: Cotton Hoodie
Description: Soft and cozy cotton hoodie with adjustable drawstring and kangaroo pocket. Ideal for cool evenings.

Name: Formal Blazer
Description: Tailored-fit blazer that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Perfect for business or evening wear.

Name: Summer Floral Dress
Description: Flowy floral summer dress with adjustable straps and a flattering waistline. Breathable and comfortable.

Name: Men's Leather Jacket
Description: Classic brown leather jacket with zip closure and side pockets. Durable and stylish for all seasons.

Name: Casual Sneakers
Description: Lightweight sneakers designed for everyday wear. Breathable material with cushioned soles.

Name: Classic Black Dress Pants
Description: Slim-cut black dress pants that offer a polished look for formal or office wear.

Name: Knitted Sweater
Description: Warm knitted sweater with a crew neckline and ribbed cuffs. Ideal for layering in winter.

Name: Men's Polo Shirt
Description: Classic short-sleeve polo shirt with a soft feel and neat collar. Perfect for casual Fridays.

Name: Women's Trench Coat
Description: Chic beige trench coat with adjustable belt and water-resistant fabric. A wardrobe essential.

Name: Wool Scarf
Description: Soft wool scarf that keeps you warm while adding a stylish touch to your winter outfits.
